title: After Upgrading to Android 10 the phone is full of bugs
content:
My phone is pixel 1 "Sailfish" and after upgrading to android 10 the following issues appeared:
1) Mic is not working
2) there is no any sound coming out of the speaker
3) I can't record any videos with sound
4) I can't make any calls, the mobile freeze when I answer any call

Note: I can't unlock bootloader to flash a factory image or something because its a verizon phone.
Please Help, literally my life has stopped and I tried factory reset and nothing happened.
